pullRequest.title: Adding backward compatible classname mapping from old plugins classname
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adding a map from old Plugins classname to new classname.
This is to avoid break if existing user upgrade to new Pinot version.

commit.message: Adding backward compatible classname mapping from old plugins classname

nodes.bodyText: Recommend making it private and test with the old class name in the test?

Save a map lookup by doing:
return PLUGINS_BACKWARD_COMPATIBLE_CLASS_NAME_MAP.getOrDefault(className, className);
